questions.blood_pressure: What is your blood pressure reading?
questions.symptoms: Are you experiencing dizziness, weakness, confusion, or cold/clammy skin?
questions.recent_illness: Have you been sick recently with vomiting, diarrhea, or fever?
questions.dehydration: Have you been drinking enough fluids?
questions.medical_history: Do you have heart disease, diabetes, or adrenal insufficiency?

triage_rules.expression: int(str(blood_pressure).split('/')[0]) < 90 and ('confusion' in str(symptoms).lower() or 'cold' in str(symptoms).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Hypotension with altered mental status - Possible shock - Immediate Emergency Care Required
